channel.title: How do I Change Where Players Start Off?
channel.description:
Ok when people come onto my server i want them to apear somwhere else and not at bank like normal.
How do i change when players start off?
Please Help Thanks Kilopy :):):):)[br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 09:06:32 AM[/size][hr]and if you can help aswell how to i change where players end up when they die?
